ivardefs.name: coverage_
ivardefs.desc: The party(s) that are responsible for covering the payment of this account, and what order should they be applied to the account.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: Provides additional information about what the account tracks and how it is used.

ivardefs.name: guarantor_
ivardefs.desc: The parties responsible for balancing the account if other payment options fall short.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Unique identifier used to reference the account.  Might or might not be intended for human use (e.g. credit card number).

ivardefs.name: name
ivardefs.desc: Name used for the account when displaying it to humans in reports, etc.

ivardefs.name: owner
ivardefs.desc: Indicates the service area, hospital, department, etc. with responsibility for managing the Account.

ivardefs.name: servicePeriod
ivardefs.desc: The date range of services associated with this account.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Indicates whether the account is presently used/usable or not.

ivardefs.name: subject_
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the entity which incurs the expenses. While the immediate recipients of services or goods might be entities related to the subject, the expenses were ultimately incurred by the subject of the Account.

ivardefs.name: type
ivardefs.desc: Categorizes the account for reporting and searching purposes.

properties.desc: A financial tool for tracking value accrued for a particular purpose.  In the healthcare field, used to track charges for a patient, cost centers, etc.
